name: MySQL5

getPSDEDataQueryCodeConds.customCond: FIND_IN_SET ( t1.ID, (select tt.childStories from zt_story tt where tt.id = ${srfdatacontext('srfparentkey','{"defname":"ID","dename":"ZT_RELEASE"}')}))
getPSDEDataQueryCodeConds.name: 查询条件

queryCode:
SELECT
	t1.`ID`,	
	t1.`TITLE`,
	t1.STORYSN
	FROM
		`zt_story` t1
